class.name: it.giuseppe.salvi.library.vp.core.uil.download.ImageDownloader.Scheme
class.comment: Represents supported schemes(protocols) of URI. Provides convenient methods for work with schemes and URIs.

field.name: Center_Crop
field.comment: Scale the image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or larger than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).

field.name: Center
field.comment: Center the image in the view, but perform no scaling.

field.name: Center_Inside
field.comment: Scale the image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or less than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).

property.name: FromAssets
property.comment: Returns a references to the file added to the files tab. These file are read-only.

property.name: FromHttp
property.comment: Returns image is located in the network.

property.name: FromExtSdCard
property.comment: Returns image is located on the local file system or external SD card.

property.name: FromSdCard
property.comment: Returns image is located on the local file system or SD card

property.name: FromHttps
property.comment: Returns the image is located in the network.

class.name: it.giuseppe.salvi.library.vp.core.PhotoPagerMain
class.event: MatrixChanged(Left As Int, Top As Int, Right As Int, Bottom As Int, Width As Int, Height As Int, CenterX As Int, CenterY As Int)
PageScrolled(Position As Int, PositionOffset As Float, PositionOffsetPixels As Int)
ScaleChanged(ScaleFactor As Int,FocusX As Int, FocusY As Int)

method.name: GetPageTag
method.comment: Get or Sets the tag associated with this views. A tag can be used to mark a view in its hierarchy and does not have to be unique within the hierarchy. Tags can also be used to store data within a view without resorting to another data structure. index: the index of the page tag: return the Object stored in this view as a tag, or null if not set

method.name: AddImageAt
method.comment: Add an image from sdcard or AssetsDir to the desired position in the view pager.

method.name: ClearMemoryCache
method.comment: Clears memory cache.

method.name: SwapView
method.comment: Swaps the elements at the specified positions in the specified list. (If the specified positions are equal, invoking this method leaves the list unchanged.) i: the index of one element to be swapped. j: the index of the other element to be swapped.

method.name: IsPageEnabled
method.comment: Returns the enabled status for this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass. index: Page index Return type: @return:True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.

method.name: ClearDiskCache
method.comment: Clears disk cache.

method.name: ShowFromWeb
method.comment: show images from web.

method.name: ShowFromSdCard
method.comment: show images from sdcard not from assets.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the object

method.name: LoadBitmap2
method.comment: Loads and decodes image synchronously FileName: Image width: ImageSize height: ImageSize Example: File.FromAssets,"image.png",width,height or "assets://","image.png",width,height File.FromSdCard,"image.png",width,height or "file:///mnt/sdcard/","image.png",width,height File.FromExtSdCard,"image.png",width,height or "file:///mnt/extSdCard/","image.png",width,height File.FromHttp,"image.png",width,height or "http://","site.com/image.png",width,height File.FromHttps,"image.png",width,height or "https://","site.com/image.png",width,heigh targetImageSize: Minimal size for bitmap which will be returned. Downloaded image will be decoded and scaled to bitmap of the size which is equal or larger (usually a bit larger) than incoming targetImageSize. Result image Bitmap. Can be null if image loading/decoding was failed or cancelled.

method.name: StopEngine
method.comment: Cancels all running and scheduled display image tasks. NOTE: This method doesn't shutdown if you set them. ImageLoader still can be used after calling this method.

method.name: AddViewAt
method.comment: Adds a view to the specified index. index: Page index view: View

method.name: SetPanelBackgroundImage
method.comment: Sets Background bitmap to the panel. index: Panel index bitmap: Panel bitmap

method.name: GoToPage
method.comment: Get or Sets the currently selected page.

method.name: IsPageVisible
method.comment: Returns the enabled status for this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass. index: Page index Return type: @return:True if the view in this page is visible, false otherwise.

method.name: AddImageFromWeb
method.comment: Add an image from web and from Dropbox at the end of the view pager.

method.name: ShowFromAssets
method.comment: show images from assets or sub-folder not from sdcard.

method.name: DestroyEngine
method.comment: Stops ImageLoader and clears current configuration. Use this option on exit app.

method.name: SetPageVisible
method.comment: Set the enabled state of this view. index: Page index visibility: True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.

method.name: AddImage
method.comment: Add an image from sdcard or AssetsDir at the end of the view pager .

method.name: LoadLayout
method.comment: Loads a layout file(.bal) to PhotoPager as a view. LayoutFile: Load a LayoutFile created with designer

method.name: SetPageTag
method.comment: Get or Sets the tag associated with this views. A tag can be used to mark a view in its hierarchy and does not have to be unique within the hierarchy. Tags can also be used to store data within a view without resorting to another data structure. index: the index of the page tag: set the Object stored in this view as a tag

method.name: PauseEngine
method.comment: Pause ImageLoader. All new load and display tasks won't be executed until ImageLoader is resumed. Already running tasks are not paused.

method.name: IsFadeEnabled
method.comment: Gets fade from the page.

method.name: SetPanelBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets Background Color to the panel. index: Panel index color: Panel color

method.name: LoadLayout2
method.comment: Loads a layout file(.bal) to PhotoPager to the specified index. index: Page index FileName: Load a LayoutFile created with designer

method.name: SetPageBackgroundImage
method.comment: Sets Background bitmap to the page. index: Page index bitmap: Page bitmap

method.name: GetArrayList
method.comment: Get an array.

method.name: AddView2
method.comment: Adds a view to the page. view: View left: Left top: Top width: Width height: Height

method.name: GetImageListFromAssets
method.comment: Get entire list of images stored in assets or sub-folder Examples: Dim lv as ListView Dim l as list l.Initialize lv.Initialize("lv") Sub Menu_Click Activity.AddView(lv,0,0,100%x,100%y) l = vp.GetImageListFromAssets("Here the Images folder stored in Assets") or l = vp.GetImageListFromAssets(File.DirAssets) or l = vp.GetImageListFromAssets("") For n = 0 To l.Size-1 lv.AddSingleLine(l.Get(n)) next End Sub

method.name: SetArrayList
method.comment: Set an array passed from, gallery, grid view, cover flow.

method.name: ShowFromMediaStore
method.comment: show images from media store.

method.name: SetPageEnabled
method.comment: Set the enabled state of this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass. index: Page index enabled: True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.

method.name: LoadBitmap
method.comment: Loads and decodes image synchronously. FileName: Image Example: File.FromAssets,"image.png" or "assets://","image.png" File.FromSdCard,"image.png" or "file:///mnt/sdcard/","image.png" File.FromExtSdCard,"image.png" or "file:///mnt/extSdCard/","image.png" File.FromHttp,"image.png",width,height or "http://","site.com/image.png",width,height File.FromHttps,"image.png",width,height or "https://","site.com/image.png",width,heigh Result image Bitmap. Can be null if image loading/decoding was failed or cancelled.

method.name: RemoveAllViews
method.comment: Removes all child views.

method.name: SetPageBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets Background Color to the page. index: Page index color: Page color

method.name: AddViewAt2
method.comment: Adds a view to the specified index. view: View left: Left top: Top width: Width height: Height

method.name: GetItem
method.comment:
Returns Item
Example:
i.Bitmap=LoadBitmap("",g.GetItem(Position))

method.name: RemoveViewAt
method.comment: Removes the view that is stored in specified index. index: Page index

method.name: IsLockEnabled
method.comment: Gets lock from the page.

method.name: IsZoomEnabled
method.comment: Gets zoom from the page.

method.name: AddImageFromWebAt
method.comment: Add an image from web and from Dropbox to the desired position in the view pager.

method.name: AddView
method.comment: Adds a view to the page. view: View

method.name: ResumeEngine
method.comment: Resumes waiting load and display tasks.

method.name: IsDoubleTapEnabled
method.comment: Gets double tap from the page.

property.name: SetImageOnFail
property.comment: Sets own icon on fail.

property.name: ZoomEnabled
property.comment: Sets zoom to the page.

property.name: BackgroundColorRandomly
property.comment: Set the Background Color Randomly.

property.name: CompressQuality
property.comment: Get or Sets the quality of a bitmap, that can be compressed. [ 0 = low -> 100 = high ]

property.name: Tag
property.comment: Get or Sets the tag associated with PhotoPager. A tag can be used to mark a view in its hierarchy and does not have to be unique within the hierarchy. Tags can also be used to store data within a view without resorting to another data structure.

property.name: FadeInTime
property.comment: Duration of "fade-in" animation (in milliseconds) Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from network Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from disk cache Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from memory cache.

property.name: ShowMessageError
property.comment: Set to true if you want to display an error message.

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return Author and Version of the library

property.name: CompressFormat
property.comment: Get or Sets the known formats a bitmap can be compressed into [ JPG or PNG ]

property.name: FadeEnabled
property.comment: Sets fade to the page.

property.name: MediumScale
property.comment: Sets the medium scale

property.name: MinimumScale
property.comment: Sets the minimum scale

property.name: ProgressBarVisible
property.comment: Set the enabled state of this view. - by default is true.

property.name: OutlineEnabled
property.comment: Enable or disable outline to photo pager.

property.name: File
property.comment:
Return File:
File.FromAssets File.FromSdCard File.FromExtSdCard File.FromHttp File.FromHttps

property.name: ScaleType
property.comment:
Controls how the image should be resized or moved to match the size of this ImageView.
by default is Fit_Center.

property.name: CacheOnDisk
property.comment: Sets whether loaded image will be cached on disk - by default false.

property.name: Effect
property.comment: Get or Sets transition effect

property.name: Color
property.comment: Returns one of the Color value in the list

property.name: MaximumScale
property.comment: Sets the maximum scale

property.name: SetImageForEmptyUri
property.comment: Sets own icon on loading.

property.name: DoubleTapEnabled
property.comment: Sets double tap to the page.

property.name: Length
property.comment: Returns length.

property.name: AdjustViewBounds
property.comment: Get or Sets this to true if you want the ImageView to adjust its bounds to preserve the aspect ratio of its drawable.

property.name: CurrentItem
property.comment: Get or Sets the currently selected page.

property.name: OutlineColor
property.comment: Sets outline color to photo pager.

property.name: LockEnabled
property.comment: Sets lock to the page.

property.name: CacheInMemory
property.comment: Sets whether loaded image will be cached in memory - by default false.
